sentence.text: He regarded perpetual change as the fundamental law governing all things -- a view which is summarized in his famous aphorism , ` You can not step twice into the same river " .
His Meditations , with their emphasis on the vicissitudes of perpetual change , exude an air of world-weariness .
This perpetual change and development is the basic reason why advertising is such a stimulating business in which to work .
Elisabeth thought , and the thoughts tumbled about in her head in perpetual motion .
